typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

documentation.text:
@dev This function can be called from external source and also from within the contract
 @param dilutionId this is the id of the contribution to which the winner is to be decleared

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

documentation.text:
@dev This function can be called from external source and also from within the contract
 @param dilutionId this is the id of the contribution to which the winner is to be decleared

DilutionRequestCreated(address,uint256,u.details: This is when a dilution request is created.

params.amount: the amount of tokens to be minted
params.ballotId: Id of the ballot where voting is stored
params.depositAmount: this is the amount of tokens deposited by user in order to create voting
params.dilutionId: This is the id of the dilution structure that is linked to this ballot
params.recordId: This is the id of the record that is linked to this ballot
params.requester: the person who has requested for token dilution
params.tokenId: token that is to be minted

DilutionResult(uint256,uint256,uint256,b.details: this event is generated when result of a ballot is declared

params.ballotId: this is the ballot Id for which result is declared
params.dilutionId: This is the id of dilution request
params.minTurnOut: this status indicates if minimum amount of user showed up for voting either true if user won that is he received more than 66% of votes or false if user lost
params.result: this is the status of the result,
params.tokenId: This is the id of the contribution that is linked to this ballot

DilutionVoting(address,uint256,uint256,b.details: This is when a vote is given by user.

params.ballotId: Id of the ballot where voting is stored
params.dilutionId: This is the id of the dilution structure that is linked to this ballot
params.vote: State of vote : true for yes and false for No

_handleUserTokenTransfers(address,uint25.details: This function will be called when either user is transferring the tokens to other account, or is receiving tokens from other tokens.

params.newBalance: this is the new balance of the user that is after the transfer
params.previousBalance: this is the old balance of the user
params.user: address of the user whose balance is being changed

castVote(uint256,bool).details: This function is called by any user to cast vote

params.dilutionId: this is the id of the dilution request for which user is voting
params.vote: this is the state of the vote, if true than it means the vote is in favour of the ballot

createDilutionRequest(uint256,uint256,ui.details: This function will create a new contribution voting ballot

params.recordId: this is the id of the record whose dilution request is to be created
params.tokenId: the token that needs to be diluted

declareWinner(uint256).details: This function can be called from external source and also from within the contract

params.dilutionId: this is the id of the contribution to which the winner is to be decleared

initialize(address,address).details: This function sets the treasury Contract address and the governance address

params.newGovernanceContractAddress: This is the address for the governance contract
params.newTreasuryContractAddress: This is the new address of treasury contract

initialize(address,address,address).details: This is to set the address of the contracts

params.newGovernanceContractAddress: This is the address for the governance contract
params.newTreasuryContractAddress: This is the address of new treasury contract
params.newTreasuryCoreContractAddress: This is the address of new treasury core contract

setDepositAmount(uint256).details: This function sets the VOTING_DEPOSIT percentage

params.depositAmount: This is the new deposit amount needed for creating ballot

setMinTurnOut(uint256).details: This function sets the MIN_TURN_OUT percentage

params.minTurnOut: This is the new turnout percentage value

setOwnerAddress(address).details: This function sets the owner address

params.ownerAddress: This is the address of the owner

setVotingPeriod(uint256).details: This function sets the VOTING_BLOCK_PERIOD percentage
